Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 23rd overall pick, by Houston in 1967...
Injured on 4/29/1967 with a Inflamed Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 7/31/1968 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 5/10/1972 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 9 weeks...
Injured on 7/25/1973 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/7/1979 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for entire career...
Won World Series with Houston in 1979...
Injured on 5/6/1981 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1981, winning 2 games with a 0.53 ERA...
Injured on 5/30/1983 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 4-5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by California on 2/4/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $2,285,858 per year...
Injured on 5/23/1985 with a Ruptured Disc Back, out for full season...
Drafted in 6th round, 115th overall pick, by Texas in 1987...
Released by Texas on 3/2/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 7/21/1987 to a minor league deal...
Traded from Texas to Cincinnati on 7/21/1987 (Going to TEX: P R. Jones. Going to CIN: P G. McCarthy)...
Injured on 6/5/1988 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/3/1993 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 9/2/1993 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 4-5 weeks...
Earned first career win on 5/7/1994...
Injured on 6/16/1994 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4-5 weeks...
Injured on 8/9/1995 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Cincinnati to Boston on 1/31/1996 (Going to BOS: 2B M. Lowell, P J. Hamilton, P G. McCarthy. Going to CIN: P P. Wagner)...
Traded from Boston to Houston on 2/11/1996 (Going to HOU: P G. McCarthy. Going to BOS: P J. Lima, 2B B. Boone)...
Was selected to the 1996 Allstar game...
